website_summaries.verdict: A substantial watch for those that like a heftier, more outdoorsy style.
pros: Rose gold-colored hands and numerals are stylish and easy to read
For sporty types, there's a stopwatch function
cons: Wrist strap can feel narrow for the size of the watch

customer_reviews.title: Updated review: 3/1/18
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE!!! Received this as a gift for my birthday and have gotten so many compliments on it, even from my stepdaughter who's 12 years old! Would high recommend this watch.. Update: 3/1/18 this is my second watch, had to send the first one back because one of the needles fell off. I alternate between this watch and another watch, I haven’t worn this one in a little while. This morning I noticed that another needle fell off! This watch looks great but I have to take 3 stars away because it seems like this watch was cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, but IT IS NOT WATERPROOF. I washed my hands while wearing it, and about 30 minutes later the watch face was fogged. I took it home, put it in rice for 36 hours, took it out, put it on, and within 5 minutes the face was fogged again. Now its garbage. **UPDATE** I put the watch in rice for 48 hours, then when I put it on and tried to set the time, THE PIN CAME OUT 🙄
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderess

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed that this product was authentic and in perfect condition for the price I bought it at. I was disappointed with the way it arrived, tin box dented and opened with the watch having fallen out, but I don't blame the seller because I had ordered a separate item at the same time. The watch is beautiful, I have a small wrist and usually have trouble finding straps with enough sizing holes but this was perfect. It is also very easy to switch straps with other compatible fossil straps. Overall highly satisfied with the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. This watch is kind of big, but so beautiful. You can see the mechanism moving inside. I am a small woman and I have very small hands but I still love it. Look at a photo where I'm wearing it. I do highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: From New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and gorgeous rose gold color
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Fossil watches and have had various types throughout the years. This one does not disappoint. I am small and was afraid this would be too big but it is actually the perfect size for my wrist. The rose gold color really stands out and looks so beautiful. Love this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Christanna U.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for any androgynous or butch ladies out there ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is exactly what I wanted. I wanted something classic and more androgynous that would still fit on my small wrist (instead of buying a "man's" watch). Great watch for any androgynous or butch ladies out there looking for something more masc that still fits. An important note: The light colored band will absolutely discolor immediately. If you get it wet at all the leather turns darker- which is pretty impossible to prevent 100%. I am actually fine with this as I like that its wearing into a darker color, but if you don't like the sound of that I recommend choosing one of the other band colors.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Stay'n out'a tha' dog house!
customer_reviews.text: Wife has been needing good ,general wear, new watch for awhile. Thought I'd do some searching and surprise her. This was a home run with her. Love's It! Detail is good with clean lines. She likes the bigger face with the small band. Say's it still looks feminine even though it has the bigger face. To me it looks good and really isn't bulky looking on her. She has some very small wrist too. Well, better get back to tiling the kitchen now, maybe I'll be surprised one day with some new wheels for my Jeep! lol
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this watch to wife on our anniversary..she absolutely loves it! Great watch, perfect dial size with superb band..good for small wrists too! Goes with almost all her dresses..a perfect gift option for wives/gf's..
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Great for small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. I wanted a "skeleton" watch as well as the the larger size. Unfortunately, most watches always seem to be for average to larger wrist sizes, and I have a very small wrist - 5 1/2 inches. This fits perfectly and even has an extra two holes if I want to tighten! Love watching the mechanisms. It does seem to gain about one minute each week, but I don't care. Very stylish and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: sandra wells

customer_reviews.title: Quality watch at decent price !!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for a great price. Comes with a nice aluminum box !!I bought it for a friend and they liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such a gorgeous watch. The face may be a bit big for some people's taste, but I don't mind it. I think it pairs nicely with the thin band. The small hands don't stay moving for me, but that's such a miniscule thing I don't mind. It keeps time well.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Get this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this watch! It is not too big for my tiny little wrist. The clock part of the watch is thicker which is styled after a men's watch. I love this watch. It is comfortable, readable, beautiful and goes with just about everything. All color description is accurate. Rose gold color and a true navy blue. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Camille Harroun

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Watch
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great. I have another Fossil watch that burns through batteries like crazy so I thought I would try their automatic/mechanical one. So far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dress it up, dress it down
customer_reviews.text: I adore this watch. It seriously goes with everything. You can dress it up or down and I get compliments on it all the time. Also, there is no pinching metal band, or discoloration on the band which happens anytime I wear something metal/nickel for too long. The brown band has gotten a little darker, probably because of sweat and lotion and normal use, but could be easily replaced. The watch face is easy to read and the hands glow in the dark, which was probably mentioned in the product description anyway, but was a nice surprise for me since I just skimmed the description. Very nice and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: g8rsgrl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I receive so many compliments on this watch! It's very comfortable to wear, it's not heavy, (I'm used to wearing a Samsung Galaxy watch). The face is a nice size to easily tell time and the date box is easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great watch! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, I wear it everyday. It goes with almost everything. Looks expensive. I got it for half price, slightly used. You’d never know it
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Clancey

customer_reviews.title: This watch is beautiful! The navy and rose gold are a perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful! The navy and rose gold are a perfect match together!! It is a little top heavy as the band is thin on the back side but I love it and would buy it again. I have also gotten numerous compliments and looks!
customer_reviews.author: Thaase

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this watch and great price! Very beautiful and well made, ticking is super quiet. Wear dressed up or down, for every occasion. My wrist is really small, but suits me well. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Not a hybrid although it comes up in the search
customer_reviews.text: So this is just a normal watch it is appealing to the eye and it is easy to maneuver however I was looking for a hybrid watch and this was not it.
customer_reviews.author: Cari A.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift from my husband
customer_reviews.text: I love my watch. My husband bought this for me and it was well worth not being able to use my Amazon account for the 2 weeks prior to Christmas, so that I wouldnt see the order history. Watch face is a tiny bit bigger than I like, but that's just the style right now. Love the leather, came in a nice tin case. All around well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Got my 3rd Original Boyfriend watch and so glad about this color navy. It's gold colored watch with navy band. Thought at first it was rose gold watch but this one looks good. The only thing different is that this watch doesn't have a protective film cover unlike the other 2. The price is unbeatable for sure. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Blackberry User

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch
customer_reviews.text: I loved the appearance of this watch. The band is real genuine leather and soft. The watch face is bold and the rose gold sets it off with the dark navy blue band. The only thing I have to get used to is that the face of the watch sits high from the wrist (not flush with wrist). I will not wear this watch to work in fear of banging the side of face on things. Otherwise I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time to buy This!
customer_reviews.text: So Pretty! Bonus- I can go to and Fossil store and get Free engraving -3 lines! I didn't know I could get that! Very Thoughtful.
customer_reviews.author: Lovee Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Probably my most favorite watch in my small collection. I wear sparingly just to preserve. Literally right at the, big but not too big, level with the case in a very classy way.
customer_reviews.author: KayLynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice Product. loved it .. you can see the picture attached too for your reference of the product....
customer_reviews.author: trived

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Been a few days since I have it it's cute. I love this watch so much. Nice buy. Will keep you posted if any complains
customer_reviews.author: Rox-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a watch for her 16th birthday, and this was perfect. The navy is deep and gorgeous. She likes mechanics, so all the features are very intriguing. It is pricey, but I believe it is quality and will last her for many years. Also, she has very tiny wrists, and this did fit her! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: F****** great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok honestly I’ve had this watch in my cart for 3 months. So I finally bought it this week and it came in today, this watch is so beautiful and all these reviews are like oh it’s fake blah blah blah, mine came is real af. My pictures don’t do it justice😩 it looks just like the photo online. It came quick! And I’m prett small and it doesn’t look bulky at all! So if you’re thinking about it JUST DO IT! I regret waiting so long to buy mine lol
customer_reviews.author: Felicia frankhouser

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with thiswatch. It's a little annoying that you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this watch. It's a little annoying that you have to reset it every time you wear it because your arm movement keeps it charged but that's the case with any watch of this type. It looks awesome, matches everything, I wear it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Have been searching for this watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! When I first discovered this watch I was going to order it right off of Fossil's website but it was out of stock. Luckily it was available on here and at a lower price! Great size, sturdy band, cool skeleton face. I have read other reviews about how it handles in water so I just choose to avoid showering with it or washing my hands with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Zomok

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch!! If you haven't used a watch with the different dials before it can be a bit confusing. Does not come with instructions. The manual is available online.
customer_reviews.author: Keianna

customer_reviews.title: Big n Chunky!
customer_reviews.text: Kinda really love this watch! Wear it daily - it's big & chunky but that's what I was looking for! The leather band has worn a bit and I wear it loosely on my wrist, but it's to be expected. I'd recommend this piece to anyone looking for the same thing - a big n chunky wristwatch! It's held up well and I've had it for about 6 months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well admired...
customer_reviews.text: My wife's coworkers and friends love the watch. Works great, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Harris Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great brand
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful and well made, I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bibliobeans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Bought watch for my wife for Valentine’s Day. Everything arrived as advertised. She loved the color and the band was nice also(not one of those cheap knock off ones). The mechanical mechanism is pretty awesome to watch and is what she liked about it the most.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very Giftable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, perfect for small wrist. Blue band almost looks black.
customer_reviews.author: WmVeteran

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous find!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chrono watch by Fossil! It is sporty yet chic due to the soft beige leather strap. It wears comfortably and really looks great. I saw this watch in a magazine but the Fossil website did not have it so once again it was Amazon.com to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: Sybille C. Denninger

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful! Not too heavy for it's size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Not too heavy for it's size. Soft leather, comfortable wear. It's not over powering or too big on my tiny wrist. LOVE it. Need one in brown and silver now!
customer_reviews.author: Lynnedm

customer_reviews.title: This is not a cheap watch and I expected better! I'm actually returning the watch for a refund
customer_reviews.text: The watch is very attractive, which is the only reason I'm giving it 2 stars. Unfortunately the watch was not shipped in its own box. It was in a plastic bag that was open and tossed into a huge box with diapers I had ordered. There was no paperwork included (i.e. Users manual, warantee, etc). The dials on the watch don't seem to work and I can't figure out how to change anything except the time. This is not a cheap watch and I expected better! I'm actually returning the watch for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Returned.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it, it did not have the same Fossil Watch quality I knew. Seems it was a cheap knockoff. The cut and look of the watch was okay, but the mechanisms seem to be low quality Chinese products.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sitton-Garvin

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! Reviews complained that it was too big... it definitely matches up to its name "original boyfriend watch "... supposed to be large... the band is skinny in comparison to the face, which makes it a little "girly ". I love big faced watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute, feminine, lightweight, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cute and not overly flashy. I also love the rose gold against the navy blue leather. Practical weight, not too heavy with quality premium leather, and feminine color combination. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for every day where dress it up dress it down
customer_reviews.author: MBMB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this for my birthday present. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. The blue is not too dark and it goes with everything. I don't ever buy watches with leather strap, but made an exception for this one. Also, most of my watches are Fossil, so I was sure it would be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Virair

customer_reviews.title: A very good watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. I didn't get paperwork either. I wear it every day. Had one years ago. Our store left and couldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brill

customer_reviews.title: Great watch if you like bold faces
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and eye-catching watch. I love watches with big faces, and this is the biggest I've ever owned. The luminescent dials are a bit of a disappointment, as the effect only lasts a few minutes after the sun goes down, but this watch is still great and i love it. It's very crisp and clean-looking, obviously easy-to-read, and not too heavy despite the size.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Love the color! I've been looking for a navy watch for some time now. The size of the face is bigger than what I usually go for but it still looks pretty and feminine. I'm a huge fan of Fossil watches and own several. This one may just be my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Manders78

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this watch. The leather band is soft and comfortable. The watch head is perfect size for my wrist. It’s dainty yet a bold time piece. Fossil brand is consistent and great quality. I’m happy to add this watch to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife, and she is extremely happy with the watch! It's stylish, got a unique design, fits well with casual and formals, and she has received many compliments for it. Another excellent product from Fossil!
customer_reviews.author: PHarik

customer_reviews.title: Fossil
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife, she has received a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Basilio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Thought it’d be too big but fit just right, as I have tiny wrists. Beautiful piece
customer_reviews.author: Zerah Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this adorable watch. Love the bulky and chunky face paired with the leather strap. Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful watch. The wife loves it. Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a gift and she loves it. She wears it when she's dressed up or dressed casual. It's very versatile. Looks great on her wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I get compliments every time I wear it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is a really beautiful watch. I love the sice of the watch ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful watch. I love the sice of the watch itself, however, the band really should've been more significant in size, thickness, and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: this looks so nice and elegant, I am totally in love with this watch
customer_reviews.author: paulami

customer_reviews.title: it's a very nice watch. But
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the mail with the second hand detached and rattling around in the glass. Other than that, it's a very nice watch. But, because of that, my girlfriend does not wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have many Fossil watches and this one is proving to be a favorite!!! Extremely comfortable band and the face is beautiful. I have a lot of compliments on it and it matches nearly everything. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This watch was a birthday gift from my husband and it is even more beautiful in person!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Townsley

customer_reviews.title: High quality with a sleek look!
customer_reviews.text: I adore Fossil watches and this may be my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: caroline m.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful But Flawed
customer_reviews.text: The watch is beautiful. I like the color and the size. However, I’m experiencing trouble with one side of the watch band. It continues to come apart and I have to connect it back. I’m currently trying to determine if I should return or take to a jeweler to repair.
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi McDowell

customer_reviews.title: nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of this watch but didn't realized how thick it would be on my wrist (1/2 inch). And beware - the band does get dirty quickly which really isn't a surprise as it is such a light color.
customer_reviews.author: Noodle

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything except wish it came with black leather band
customer_reviews.author: Alice M.

customer_reviews.title: Thin strap, big dial
customer_reviews.text: After adding $6 as taxes, the watch is for $92 which is expensive. Other than that it's an ok watch however I think the dial is too big in comparison to the strap of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: c1234smile

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!  Perfect size, great quality and comes in a darling tin box.
customer_reviews.text: My brother suprised me with this watch for Christmas, and I love it! It’s the perfect casual watch. Not to big and not to dainty. I get compliments wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my watch.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful blue watch with a stunning face. It is not heavy and fits beautifully on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I own 5 Fossil watches and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I own 5 Fossil watches and this one is my favorite to date! I’m immensely pleased with the skeleton look. Can’t stop staring at it :) It’s a real statement.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: I love fossil. It's my favorite watch brand! I have a couple and I'm never ever disappointed. This one is just as beautifully made as the rest. Do not think twice about getting it. It's very very nice.
customer_reviews.author: NickyC

customer_reviews.title: Love the Watch, Band needs to be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, and would recommend. The band is not very durable. Already need to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool watch! But it’s hard to find belts replacements
customer_reviews.text: Very cool watch! It has the perfect size for me... I love how it looks with Jeans. It’s very sport and casual. A complain could be that the belt isn’t genuine leather and it’s very long. In general, fossil leather watches are very cute but when the belts are damage it’s very hard to find the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for the money. I bought it in several colors. It looks nice and is very comfortable. It's the perfect weight also. I wish the band were a bit wider, but otherwise I am pleased. The chronograph feature is a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Evans, Wellness Integrity Wisdom

customer_reviews.title: THIS is a beautiful watch! I get so many compliments
customer_reviews.text: THIS is a beautiful watch! I get so many compliments. It makes a bold statement with class. I simply love it!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very lovely watch with an elegant face. I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: L Daley

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch!! It's comfortable and attractive. I would recommend to anyone interested in this style watch. Keeps good time too.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Shields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was nice. The was a gift and the person who received it is very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: watch doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch in March for my partners birthday. It has never kept time and slows down after a.couple of hours. Last week we finally took the watch to a watchmaker who said that it could not be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have very small wrist so when I tighten it, it's at the 1st hole. The face slides a little off the wrist because its heavy, but I love it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: heatherrenna

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. The chunky face looks great, the watch band is soft. I can't think of any complaints and have gotten many compliments as well!
customer_reviews.author: meljoj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is beautiful. I have had several compliment on it. LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Watts

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this watch and how soft the leather is. The only thing that makes it not perfect is that the leather is so soft and light that any dirt shows immediately and im now looking for something that could clean soft leather. Thats about it though. I do really like this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Count De Monee

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. It is definitely large and thick. The fact that you can buy and easily change bands makes it so versatile! I have very small wrists, but still love it.
customer_reviews.author: 2Boys2Dogs

customer_reviews.title: Nice "boyfriend" watch
customer_reviews.text: This is my first "boyfriend" watch, and I'm getting used to the larger size- I like it. I looked for watches for months before settling on this one. My photo doesn't pick up the nice rose gold color that contrasts nicely with the dark blue. I sometimes wear copper toned jewelry and the rose gold goes with it nicely. I have a pretty small wrist, so if you do too, the photo will give you an idea of the scale.
customer_reviews.author: mysinclaire

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: ordered it as a gift for my sister's birthday. And she loved it. Very classy.!!
customer_reviews.author: Adithya K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch! Stylish and fits small wrists due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch! Stylish and fits small wrists due to adjustable band. I'm a nurse and wash my hands a lot so when leather band gets wet it's fine unlike links when they get wet leave black marks on my arm.
customer_reviews.author: TLB0510

customer_reviews.title: Decent looking for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth $60. Looks really nice. It is a gift for my sister and she says she loves it. So overall Happy with the product. The straps do look a little flimsy. Will post an update after few uses.
customer_reviews.author: AmaZonFan

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND EXPECTATION! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Unique in build and appearance. Absolutely love every bit of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea N. Batista

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but strap is kinda small for someone with a wide wrist
customer_reviews.author: Ada El

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice casual watch. Wish the band was a little bigger, as I prefer my watches loose, but overall a nice watch.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch though mine came in a plastic bag and not a tin as the info indicates.Thank God it is for my own use and not a gift.
customer_reviews.author: c.c

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: My client loves her new watch. She is over the moon about it! Never disappointed with Fossil!!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Feels like i bought a out-of-date product on seeing the price ...
customer_reviews.text: The packing reveals that the product is some what old and there were some scratches on the glass. The strap color was faded and not looking as a new one. Feels like i bought a out-of-date product on seeing the price offer.Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: rahul rajagopal

customer_reviews.title: It does stick up a little more off your arm than most watches,  so be careful about catching it on things
customer_reviews.text: Have had mine for about a week & so far I love it!! Has a little of a streampunk look about it, so it catches the eye! Only wish that the hands would flow in the dark
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: llugen

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. I have had many compliments. Band and watch face color combo makes it very striking to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Pirkle

customer_reviews.title: Looks really, really good
customer_reviews.text: Amazing looking watch. The gold looks more modern than most golds.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Literally THE BEST watch ever
customer_reviews.text: Literally THE BEST watch ever! I prefer this one over any of my Michael Kors. It goes with everything and I get so many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: I love watches, but I really love this watch. I love the design. I am really satisfied with my mother's day gift.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha dunnom nixon

customer_reviews.title: An oversized watch for small wrists
customer_reviews.text: I have small wrists and most oversized watches look well, oversized on me, but too oversized to be fashionable. I was a bit apprehensive about this one, but I've now received it and absolutely love the look of it on my wrist. Yes, the actual watch face is huge on me and in fact end to end is a bit bigger than my wrist so it doesn't "curve" around it quite right, but the thin leather band tempers the oversized feel. By the way, the leather on this looks and feels marvelous. To me, the whole watch just gives off a "neat and clean" feeling and being neutral colored, it goes with so many outfits. A great everyday watch!
customer_reviews.author: Vestirse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this watch! It is extremely comfortable. Very lightweight. Not heavy at all. Just a gorgeous watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

feature_bullets: Case size: 38mm; Band size: 18mm; quartz movement with luminous 3-hand analog display; mineral crystal face; imported
Round rose gold tone plated stainless steel case; silver dial with rose gold tone hands and date window
Genuine navy blue leather band with buckle closure; interchangeable with all Fossil 18mm watch straps
Multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality; three separate dials to track hours, minutes and seconds; timer; date window; 24 hour
Water resistant to 165 feet (50 M): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling
